scripts.build:full: tsc && npm run build:styles && NODE_ENV=full vite build
scripts.build:demo: tsc && npm run build:styles && NODE_ENV=demo vite build
scripts.build:capacitor:full: tsc && npm run build:styles && NODE_ENV=full vite build --config vite-capacitor.config.ts --outDir dist-full
scripts.build:capacitor:demo: tsc && npm run build:styles && NODE_ENV=demo vite build --config vite-capacitor.config.ts --outDir dist-demo
scripts.android:dev: npm run android:sync && npx cap run android
scripts.android:sync: npm run build:capacitor:full && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:create: npm run build:capacitor:full && npx cap add android
scripts.android:open: npm run android:sync && npx cap open android
scripts.ios:dev: npm run ios:sync && npx cap run ios
scripts.ios:sync: npm run build:capacitor:full && npx cap sync ios
scripts.ios:create: npm run build:capacitor:full && npx cap add ios
scripts.ios:open: npm run ios:sync && npx cap open ios
scripts.electron:dev:full: npm run electron:sync:full && npx cap open @capacitor-community/electron
scripts.electron:dev:demo: npm run electron:sync:demo && npx cap open @capacitor-community/electron
scripts.electron:sync:full: npm run build:capacitor:full && NODE_ENV=full npx cap sync @capacitor-community/electron
scripts.electron:sync:demo: npm run build:capacitor:demo && NODE_ENV=demo npx cap sync @capacitor-community/electron
scripts.pack:full: npm run electron:sync:full && cd electron && NODE_ENV=full npm run pack:all
scripts.pack:demo: npm run electron:sync:demo && cd electron && NODE_ENV=demo npm run pack:all
scripts.pack: npm run pack:full && npm run pack:demo
